name: @cpdevtools/test-package-c
description: Test package with only a test script (no build). Exercises test and test-optional modes.

scripts.test: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); console.log('\u2713 ' + pkg.name + ': name present'); if(!pkg.version) throw new Error('version missing'); console.log('\u2713 version: ' + pkg.version); console.log('\u2713 package-c tests passed');"

author: CPDevTools
